question: you recently attended a meeting at a hotel. When you returned home, you found you had left some important papers at the hotel. write a letter to the manager of the hotel. in your letter  1- Say where you think left the papers 2- explain why they are so important3- tell the manager what you want him to do
text: Please be informed that I just want to ask for your kind assistance regarding my papers. I was recently attended the meeting at your hotel, last Wednesday, at 9 in the morning. I am Marlon Salve, I am the one who booked the hotel for the meeting.

I believe I left it inside the bathroom, the one from the opposite side of the conference room. Those are very important to me. I really need it for my presentation tomorrow. Although those can be replaced, unfortunately, I do not have time to prepare them again and it is a waste of time. The colour of the envelope is blue with a BTS logo at the centre.
I appreciated it if could call me if you are able to locate it. I will then come over to get it. Thank you in advance. Looking forward to hearing from you.

error_list.error_des: The verb was appears to be unnecessary here.
